I am trying to find out the specific partition you are trying to mount
it says Usage fdisk[options] <disk> Usage fdisk [options] <disk> Usage fdisk -s <partition>
then it has Options and 8 letters

run the command "partpbobe" the try again sudo mount /dev/sda1 /mnt/windows
